page.title: 10Religion in West Bromwich
page.content: In West Bromwich in 1985 there are many different places of worship representing various religions.This reflects the people of different races who live in the area.Places of worship include Church of England Churches, Methodist, Roman Catholic,Baptist, Christian Scientist, Christadelphian and a Sikh Temple.There are also chapels at the District Hospital and the Crematorium.All of the places of worship offer religious services on Sunday and during the week.Some hold Sunday Schools for children.Many of the places of worship have a social function providing clubs and meeting places for group activities.These include Mother and Baby groups,Cubs,Brownies,Guides, Scouts and Youth Clubs. Many provide clubs for old people.All seem well used by the community.
